name: C3
description: C3 is a fast paced dodge the blocks game.  There is plenty to do, ranging from difficult levels to random challenges. Race the clock to reach the end or try to get a high score, there is always a thrill to behold. You can even customize your block to a color of your choosing! To play, select a mode and use the A & D or Left & Right arrow keys to move from side to side.
